guide.introduction: YouTube's checklist of best practices, modified and illustrated for what we do at MAKE. Based on the YouTube Creator's Playbook, which you should download and memorize. =]
guide.introduction_rendered: YouTube's checklist of best practices, modified and illustrated for what we do at MAKE. Based on the YouTube Creator's Playbook, which you should download and memorize. =]

lines.text: Start out with a killer video concept, then workshop the idea and script with coworkers.
lines.text_raw: Start out with a killer video concept, then workshop the idea and script with coworkers.

lines.text: As seen in: Shrikify your Arduino Projects
lines.text_raw: As seen in: [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=30rPt802n1k|Shrikify your Arduino Projects]

lines.text: Optimize the first 15 seconds of your video to grab the viewer's attention.
lines.text_raw: Optimize the first 15 seconds of your video to grab the viewer's attention.

lines.text: Hold off on the series/episode branding until after you've given the viewer a reason to watch.
lines.text_raw: Hold off on the series/episode branding until after you've given the viewer a reason to watch.

lines.text: Include viewer interaction in your videos through asking specific questions, featuring fans, or by addressing the audience in the videos. Provide specific calls-to-action:
lines.text_raw: Include viewer interaction in your videos through asking specific questions, featuring fans, or by addressing the audience in the videos. Provide specific calls-to-action:

lines.text: Ask for comments
lines.text_raw: Ask for comments

lines.text: Ask for viewers to show you their projects
lines.text_raw: Ask for viewers to show you their projects

lines.text: Ask viewers to subscribe and watch related videos
lines.text_raw: Ask viewers to subscribe and watch related videos

lines.text: Examples: Lonely Christmas Tree, Doily Wedges, Beating Heart Headband
lines.text_raw: Examples: [http://youtu.be/2FnnwmqvJKY?t=1m49s|Lonely Christmas Tree], [http://youtu.be/ySqKohG_m7U?t=3m23s|Doily Wedges], [http://youtu.be/gbUVIZi9aLo?t=3m16s|Beating Heart Headband]

lines.text: Plan your annotations ahead of time to go along with calls-to-action.
lines.text_raw: Plan your annotations ahead of time to go along with calls-to-action.

lines.text: Consider producing videos or segments specifically for your audience and the purpose of engaging with them.
lines.text_raw: Consider producing videos or segments specifically for your audience and the purpose of engaging with them.

lines.text: Release on schedule!
lines.text_raw: Release on schedule!

lines.text: One key to success on YouTube is releasing videos on a consistent schedule.
lines.text_raw: One key to success on YouTube is releasing videos on a consistent schedule.

lines.text: If you know you're going to be late, let your producer know ASAP in case the schedule can be shuffled.
lines.text_raw: If you know you're going to be late, let your producer know ASAP in case the schedule can be shuffled.

lines.text: Know your numbers!
lines.text_raw: Know your numbers!

lines.text: Use Analytics to better understand your audience, improve your content, and help you develop effective programming and production strategies.
lines.text_raw: Use Analytics to better understand your audience, improve your content, and help you develop effective programming and production strategies.

lines.text: Matt's Enough Already gained a lot of blog traction both upon release and again later on.
lines.text_raw: Matt's [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-SzB5OQUcOU|Enough Already] gained a lot of blog traction both upon release and again later on.

lines.text: Collin's Homebrew Piezo video had a spike in viewership when included as an end card/annotation in his later DIY Contact Mic episode.
lines.text_raw: Collin's [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K3G2QM5a-9U|Homebrew Piezo] video had a spike in viewership when included as an end card/annotation in his later [http://youtu.be/aOJuCYgmPPE?t=7m38s|DIY Contact Mic] episode.

lines.text: The baseline channel viewer-to-subscriber conversion rate increased when we started making sure every video contained the "subscribe" annotation throughout (over the corner logo bug)
lines.text_raw: The baseline channel viewer-to-subscriber conversion rate increased when we started making sure every video contained the "subscribe" annotation throughout (over the corner logo bug)

lines.text: Include logo bug at 60% opacity
lines.text_raw: Include logo bug at 60% opacity

lines.text: Include clips of related videos for annotating later
lines.text_raw: Include clips of related videos for annotating later

lines.text: Gaining subscribers and click-throughs on related videos are very important - edit your credit sequence accordingly
lines.text_raw: Gaining subscribers and click-throughs on related videos are very important - edit your credit sequence accordingly

lines.text: Some great credit sequences: Tuning Fork, Lonely Christmas Tree, iPhone Gloves
lines.text_raw: Some great credit sequences: [http://youtu.be/EaIOuM21_qA?t=1m52s|Tuning Fork], [http://youtu.be/2FnnwmqvJKY?t=2m5s|Lonely Christmas Tree], [http://youtu.be/ljN1vObUa5E?t=2m19s|iPhone Gloves]

lines.text: Download the sample graphics package (logo bug overlay, Benton Sans font, etc. at 720p and 1080p)
lines.text_raw: [http://cdn.makezine.com/make/2012/01/video-asset-package.zip|Download the sample graphics package] (logo bug overlay, Benton Sans font, etc. at 720p and 1080p)

lines.text: Write detailed and comprehensive metadata following keyword strategies and formatting.
lines.text_raw: Write detailed and comprehensive metadata following keyword strategies and formatting.

lines.text: The YouTube metadata may be a 3rd person conversion of your 1st person blog post, or vice versa.
lines.text_raw: The YouTube metadata may be a 3rd person conversion of your 1st person blog post, or vice versa.

lines.text: Titles are important! Use keywords; they're worth more for SEO in the title field than anywhere else.
lines.text_raw: Titles are important! Use keywords; they're worth more for SEO in the title field than anywhere else.

lines.text: Create an eye-catching thumbnail at the same dimensions as your video
lines.text_raw: Create an eye-catching thumbnail at the same dimensions as your video

lines.text: Keep in mind many playback locations will see a big PLAY button at the thumbnail's dead center, so don't hide the image's focus behind it.
lines.text_raw: Keep in mind many playback locations will see a big PLAY button at the thumbnail's dead center, so don't hide the image's focus behind it.

lines.text: Upload the video's thumbnail AS SOON as the video is finished processing.
lines.text_raw: Upload the video's thumbnail AS SOON as the video is finished processing.

lines.text: Otherwise the default thumbnail may "stick" for ~24 hours before rolling over to the one you uploaded.
lines.text_raw: Otherwise the default thumbnail may "stick" for ~24 hours before rolling over to the one you uploaded.

lines.text: Annotate the video with community calls to action, subscribe button, and links to related content.
lines.text_raw: Annotate the video with community calls to action, subscribe button, and links to related content.

lines.text: Annotations make a big difference in traffic and viewer-to-subscriber conversion.
lines.text_raw: Annotations make a big difference in traffic and viewer-to-subscriber conversion.

lines.text: Go into the annotations editor on an existing video for examples on annotation styles - Example here is The Wolfe's Den Treehouse
lines.text_raw: Go into the annotations editor on an existing video for examples on annotation styles - Example here is [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z1s1n4qvZEc|The Wolfe's Den Treehouse]

lines.text: Add the video to your playlist and any other relevant topical playlists on the channel, and move the video to position 1 in the playlist(s)
lines.text_raw: Add the video to your playlist and any other relevant topical playlists on the channel, and move the video to position 1 in the playlist(s)

lines.text: Set the video as featured video on the channel page.
lines.text_raw: Set the video as featured video on the channel page.

lines.text: Move the video's primary playlist to the top of the "featured playlists" block.
lines.text_raw: Move the video's primary playlist to the top of the "featured playlists" block.

lines.text: Optional: Set video as a video response to a popular and relevant video from your channel.
lines.text_raw: Optional: Set video as a video response to a popular and relevant video from your channel.

lines.text: Blog your video on MAKE with proper categories, tags, and links (see the Launching a Video on MAKE technique for full instructions)
lines.text_raw: Blog your video on MAKE with proper categories, tags, and links (see the Launching a Video on MAKE technique for full instructions)

lines.text: Interact with viewers in the first few hours after you upload new content.
lines.text_raw: Interact with viewers in the first few hours after you upload new content.

lines.text: Respond to comments and be active on social media sites to build engagement around new uploads.
lines.text_raw: Respond to comments and be active on social media sites to build engagement around new uploads.

lines.text: Keep an open mind for viewer suggestions, requests, and questions. They can be great fodder for future videos.
lines.text_raw: Keep an open mind for viewer suggestions, requests, and questions. They can be great fodder for future videos.

lines.text: Perform outreach to blogs, sites and online communities for relevant videos.
lines.text_raw: Perform outreach to blogs, sites and online communities for relevant videos.

lines.text: Track engagement on social media sites and assess the incoming traffic from those communities to your YouTube content.
lines.text_raw: Track engagement on social media sites and assess the incoming traffic from those communities to your YouTube content.
